document.full_text: a recent increase in u.s. inflation is driven primarily by rising commodity prices globally, and is unlikely to persist, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke said on monday.
document.title: inflation spike won't last, bernanke says
lines_and_colors: a recent increase in u.s. inflation is driven primarily by rising commodity prices globally, and is unlikely to persist, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke said on monday.
